lead_paragraph: Fabio Capello was always confident his fellow Italian Antonio Conte would be a success as Chelsea manager.    Ahead of the Premier League leaders’ trip to West Ham United on Monday, the former England manager says Conte showed signs during his coaching career in Italy that suggested he was capable of winning the English title.

headline.main: Capello Not Surprised by Conte's Chelsea Success
